text: aur jab unhonne pravesh kiya jis tarah se unake baap ne unhen aadesh diya tha - allaah kee or se honevaalee kisee cheez ko vah unase hata nahin sakata tha. bas yaaqoob ke jee kee ek ichchha thee, jo usane pooree kar lee. aur nissandeh vah gyaanavaan tha, kyonki hamane use gyaan pradaan kiya tha; kintu adhikatar log jaanate nahin
